invalidateCache(int).Description: Removes an item from the cache. This will force the item to be re-read from the data source the next time @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#CursorObjectAdapter#get_E@ is called.

isClosed().Description: Returns true if the adapter, and hence the backing @B_android#database#Cursor_E@, is closed; false otherwise.

Parameters: Cursor: The new cursor to be used.
swapCursor(android.database.Cursor).Description: Swap in a new Cursor, returning the old Cursor. Unlike changeCursor(Cursor), the returned old Cursor is not closed.

close().Description: Closes this adapter, closing the backing @B_android#database#Cursor_E@ as well.

Parameters: Cursor: The new cursor to be used.
changeCursor(android.database.Cursor).Description: Changes the underlying cursor to a new cursor. If there is an existing cursor it will be closed if it is different than the new cursor.

get(int).Description: Returns the item for the given position.

invalidateCache(int, int).Description: Removes count items starting at index.

size().Description: Returns the number of items in the adapter.

onMapperChanged().Description: Called when @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#CursorObjectAdapter#setMapper_E@ is called and a different mapper is provided.

getMapper().Description: Returns the @B_android#support#v17#leanback#database#CursorMapper_E@ used to convert @B_android#database#Cursor_E@ rows into Objects.

isImmediateNotifySupported().Description: Returns true if the adapter pairs each underlying data change with a call to notify and false otherwise.
